Note_1: This value is in (KK Character Maker): Body->Chest->Nipple Color
Note_2: This value is in (KK Character Maker): Face->Makeup->Cheek Color
Note_3: This value is in (KK Character Maker): Face->Eyebrows->Eyebrow Color
Note_4: Optional: The color is already set to KK's default color
Note_5: This value is in (KK Character Maker): Face->Eyes->Eyeliner Color
Note_6: This value corresponds to: Hair Base Color
Note_7: This value corresponds to: Hair Root Color (Enable Root and Tip Color Adjustment)
Note_8: This value corresponds to: Hair Tip Color (Enable Root and Tip Color Adjustment)
